message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $110 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $105 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $108.
